title: Attosecond correlation dynamics
abstract: Photoemission of an electron is commonly treated as a one-particle phenomenon. With attosecond streaking spectroscopy we observe the breakdown of this single active-electron approximation by recording up to six attoseconds retardation of the dislodged photoelectron due to electronic correlations. We recorded the photon-energy-dependent emission timing of electrons, released from the helium ground state by an extreme-ultraviolet photon, either leaving the ion in its ground state or exciting it into a shake-up state. We identify an optical field-driven d.c. Stark shift of charge-asymmetric ionic states formed after the entangled photoemission as a key contribution to the observed correlation time shift. These findings enable a complete wavepacket reconstruction and are universal for all polarized initial and final states. Sub-attosecond agreement with quantum mechanical ab initio modelling allows us to determine the absolute zero of time in the photoelectric effect to a precision better than 1/25th of the atomic unit of time.
abstract_cn: 电子的光发射通常被视为单粒子现象。利用阿秒条纹光谱学，通过记录由于电子相关而引起的被移出的光电子的多达6个阿秒延迟，我们观察到了这种单一的有源电子近似的分解。我们记录了由极紫外光子从氦基态释放的电子的光子能量依赖性发射定时，该离子要么保持其基态，要么激发其进入摇动状态。我们确定了光场驱动的直流电纠缠的光发射后形成的电荷不对称离子态的明显位移，是观察到的相关时间位移的关键因素。这些发现使完整的波包重构成为可能，并且对于所有极化的初始和最终状态都是通用的。与量子力学ab＆＃160; initio建模的亚秒级协议使我们能够确定光电效应中的时间绝对值为零，其精度优于原子时间单位的1/25。

title: High-resolution studies of the Majorana atomic chain platform
title_cn: Majorana原子链平台的高分辨率研究
abstract: Ordered assemblies of magnetic atoms on the surface of conventional superconductors can be used to engineer topological superconducting phases and realize Majorana fermion quasiparticles (MQPs) in a condensed matter setting. Recent experiments have shown that chains of Fe atoms on Pb generically have the required electronic characteristics to form a one-dimensional topological superconductor and have revealed spatially resolved signatures of localized MQPs at the ends of such chains. Here we report higher-resolution measurements of the same atomic chain system performed using a dilution refrigerator scanning tunnelling microscope (STM). With significantly better energy resolution than previous studies, we show that the zero-bias peak (ZBP) in Fe chains has no detectable splitting from hybridization with other states. The measurements also reveal that the ZBP exhibits a distinctive ‘double eye’ spatial pattern on nanometre length scales. Theoretically we show that this is a general consequence of STM measurements of MQPs with substantial spectral weight in the superconducting substrate, a conclusion further supported by measurements of Pb overlayers deposited on top of the Fe chains. Finally, we report experiments performed with superconducting tips in search of the particle–hole symmetric MQP signature expected in such measurements.
abstract_cn: 常规超导体表面上有序的磁性原子组装体可用于工程化拓扑超导相，并在凝聚态环境中实现马约拉那费米子准粒子（MQP）。最近的实验表明，Pb上的Fe原子链通常具有形成一维拓扑超导体所需的电子特性，并且在此类链的末端揭示了局部MQP的空间分辨特征。在这里，我们报告使用稀释冰箱扫描隧道显微镜（STM）进行的同一原子链系统的更高分辨率测量。通过比以前的研究明显更好的能量分辨率，我们证明了铁链中的零偏峰（ZBP）没有与其他状态杂交产生可检测的分裂。测量结果还显示ZBP具有独特的“双眼”外观。纳米长度尺度上的空间格局。从理论上讲，我们表明这是对超导基质中具有显着光谱权重的MQP进行STM测量的一般结果，这一结论进一步得到了沉积在Fe链顶部的Pb覆盖层测量的支持。最后，我们报告了用超导尖端进行的实验，以寻找此类测量中预期的粒子孔对称MQP签名。

title: Long-range mutual synchronization of spin Hall nano-oscillators
title_cn: 自旋霍尔纳米振荡器的远程相互同步
abstract: The spin Hall effect in a non-magnetic metal with spin–orbit coupling injects transverse spin currents into adjacent magnetic layers, where the resulting spin transfer torque can drive spin wave auto-oscillations. Such spin Hall nano-oscillators (SHNOs) hold great promise as extremely compact and broadband microwave signal generators and magnonic spin wave injectors. Here we show that SHNOs can also be mutually synchronized with unprecedented efficiency. We demonstrate mutual synchronization of up to nine individual SHNOs, each separated by 300 nm. Through further tailoring of the connection regions we can extend the synchronization range to 4 μm. The mutual synchronization is observed electrically as an increase in the power and coherence of the microwave signal, and confirmed optically using micro-Brillouin light scattering microscopy as two spin wave regions sharing the same spectral content, in agreement with our micromagnetic simulations.
abstract_cn: 具有自旋轨道耦合的非磁性金属中的自旋霍尔效应将横向自旋电流注入到相邻的磁性层中，在此产生的自旋传递扭矩可以驱动自旋波自激。 这种自旋霍尔纳米振荡器（SHNOs）具有极为紧凑的宽带微波信号发生器和强力自旋波注入器的潜力。 在这里，我们表明SHNO也可以以前所未有的效率相互同步。 我们演示了多达9个单独的SHNO的相互同步，每个单独的SHNO之间相隔300纳米。 通过进一步定制连接区域，我们可以将同步范围扩展到4μm。 在电学上可以观察到相互同步，因为微波信号的功率和相干性增加，并且使用微布里渊光散射显微镜在光学上得到确认，因为两个自旋波区域共享相同的光谱含量，这与我们的微磁模拟一致。

title: Control of spin–orbit torques through crystal symmetry in WTe2/ferromagnet bilayers
title_cn: 通过WTe2 /铁磁体双层中的晶体对称性控制自旋轨道转矩
abstract: Recent discoveries regarding current-induced spin–orbit torques produced by heavy-metal/ferromagnet and topological-insulator/ferromagnet bilayers provide the potential for dramatically improved efficiency in the manipulation of magnetic devices. However, in experiments performed to date, spin–orbit torques have an important limitation—the component of torque that can compensate magnetic damping is required by symmetry to lie within the device plane. This means that spin–orbit torques can drive the most current-efficient type of magnetic reversal (antidamping switching) only for magnetic devices with in-plane anisotropy, not the devices with perpendicular magnetic anisotropy that are needed for high-density applications. Here we show experimentally that this state of affairs is not fundamental, but rather one can change the allowed symmetries of spin–orbit torques in spin-source/ferromagnet bilayer devices by using a spin-source material with low crystalline symmetry. We use WTe2, a transition-metal dichalcogenide whose surface crystal structure has only one mirror plane and no two-fold rotational invariance. Consistent with these symmetries, we generate an out-of-plane antidamping torque when current is applied along a low-symmetry axis of WTe2/Permalloy bilayers, but not when current is applied along a high-symmetry axis. Controlling spin–orbit torques by crystal symmetries in multilayer samples provides a new strategy for optimizing future magnetic technologies.
abstract_cn: 有关重金属/铁磁体和拓扑绝缘体/铁磁体双层产生的电流感应自旋轨道转矩的最新发现提供了显着提高操纵磁器件效率的潜力。但是，在迄今为止进行的实验中，自旋轨道转矩具有重要的局限性，对称性要求能够补偿磁阻尼的转矩分量位于设备平面内。这意味着，自旋轨道转矩只能驱动具有平面内各向异性的磁性设备，而不是高密度应用所需的具有垂直磁性各向异性的设备，从而驱动电流效率最高的类型的磁反转（抗阻尼开关）。在这里，我们通过实验证明这种状态不是基本的，而是可以通过使用具有低晶体对称性的自旋源材料来更改自旋源/铁磁体双层设备中自旋轨道转矩的允许对称性。我们使用WTe 2 ，一种过渡金属二卤化钨，其表面晶体结构只有一个镜面并且没有两倍的旋转不变性。与这些对称性一致，当沿WTe 2 /坡莫合金双层低对称轴施加电流时，我们会产生平面外的抗阻尼转矩，而当沿高对称施加电流时则不会产生轴。通过多层样品中的晶体对称性控制自旋轨道扭矩为优化未来的磁学技术提供了新的策略。

title: Light-controlled flows in active fluids
abstract: Many photosynthetic microorganisms are able to detect light and move towards optimal intensities. This ability, known as phototaxis, plays a major role in ecology by affecting natural phytoplankton mass transfers, and has important applications in bioreactor and artificial micro-swimmers technologies. Here we show that this property can be exploited to generate macroscopic fluid flows using a localized light source directed towards shallow suspensions of phototactic microorganisms. Within the intensity range of positive phototaxis, algae accumulate beneath the excitation light, where collective effects lead to the emergence of radially symmetric convective flows. These flows can thus be used as hydrodynamic tweezers to manipulate small floating objects. At high cell density and layer depth, we uncover a new kind of instability, wherein the viscous torque exerted by self-generated fluid flows on the swimmers induces the formation of travelling waves. A model coupling fluid flow, cell concentration and orientation finely reproduces the experimental data.
abstract_cn: 许多光合微生物能够检测光并向最佳强度移动。这种功能称为趋光性，它通过影响自然浮游植物的传质在生态学中发挥重要作用，并且在生物反应器和人工微泳器技术中具有重要的应用。在这里，我们表明可以使用针对光战术微生物的浅悬浮液的局部光源来利用此属性生成宏观流体流。在正趋光性的强度范围内，藻类积聚在激发光下，在那里集体效应导致出现径向对称的对流。这些流量因此可以用作水力镊子来操纵小的漂浮物。在高细胞密度和层深度的情况下，我们发现了一种新型的不稳定性，其中自生流体流向游泳者施加的粘性扭矩诱导了行波的形成。流体流动，细胞浓度和方向耦合的模型可以很好地再现实验数据。
